title: Beulah Park
address: 3648 Beulah Park Dr, Grove City, OH 43123
community-features: Beulah Park stands as a shining example of New Urbanism, a meticulously designed 220-acre master-planned community that elevates the art of living. Connected seamlessly to downtown Grove City, within its bounds, you'll discover a perfect synergy of custom homes, captivating entertainment, walking paths, and expansive green areas, all curated to enhance the quality of life for everyone.

title: Edgewater
community-features: Welcome to this well-established Hilliard, Ohio community, perfectly situated near the intersection of I-270 and Hilliard Rome Road. Here, residents revel in the convenience of nearby shopping centers, including a Sam's Club, while also enjoying the expansive park with its soccer field and picturesque walking trails. A tight-knit neighborhood thrives on a sense of unity and camaraderie, and whether you seek a charming home, you'll find a range of housing options tailored to your lifestyle. Embrace the inviting ambiance where the intersection of convenience and leisure creates an ideal place to call home in Hilliard, Ohio.
